lead_paragraph: State lawyers said in a court filing on Friday that the supply of midazolam has expired, while supplies of the controversial lethal-injection drug have dried up.

headline.print_headline: Arizona Opts to Abandon Sedative’s Use in Executions
headline.main: Arizona Scraps Use of Sedative for Lethal Injections

snippet: State lawyers said in a court filing on Friday that the supply of midazolam has expired, while supplies of the controversial lethal-injection drug have dried up.
